column4: I have a problem, i've a webcam which is mounted on /dev/video1 and i have a TV tuner mounted on /dev/video0. I want to mount my webcam on /dev/video0 because i want to use this webcam in amsn.
Theunixgeek: I already have install driver ov51x for my webcam
It seems not to be a problem of driver =/
what software are you using? You should be able to tell it whcih one to use
